short_summary: Purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture for the Public Prosecution Service of Canada in Thunder Bay, Ontario
description: Please note that this Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) No. 20240022, cancels and supersedes NPP No. 1000032961 dated January 16th, 2024 with a closing of February 2nd, 2024 at 1400hrs Eastern Standard Time (EST).
full_summary:
### Office Furniture Tender Announcement
#### Solicitation Number: 20240022
As part of this Request for Proposal (RFP), Public Prosecution Service of Canada (PPSC) is soliciting proposals for the supply and installation of office furniture to their location in Thunder Bay, Ontario. This procurement is set aside in accordance with the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

Eligible vendors must be contract-hotels registered by Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC). PSPC will evaluate proposals based on price, delivery dates and installation schedule, and quality of products and services provided.

Key Documents & Status
- **Solicitation Number:** 20240022
- **Tender Status:** Expired
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 13, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date:** June 30, 2024

**Required Products**
- Interconnecting panels and freestanding systems
- Freestanding height-adjustable desk/table products
- Metal filing and storage cabinets
- Support Space – Collaborative Furniture

**Purchase and Delivery**
- Deadline for Purchase Order award: Not Specified
- Delivery and Installation to: Thunder Bay, Ontario

**Eligibile Vendors**
- Vendors must be registered on PSPC's Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C

**Procedural Notes**
- This procurement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and excluded from international trade agreements.
- Article 800 of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) does not apply to this procurement.

For further information, contact:
- **Contact Name:** Jessica Roy-Labelle
- **Contact Email:** [jessica.roy-labelle@ppsc-sppc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.roy-labelle@ppsc-sppc.gc.ca)
- **Contact Telephone:** (343) 550-9703

#### Attachments
- Tender Notice (English) [pdf link]
- Tender Notice (French) [pdf link]
- Revised Open Area Plan (French) [pdf link]
- Revised Furniture Plan (French) [pdf link] Note: Supporting documents are also available in French and English. Please refer to the links above.

Not all options have been used. I used option 1.
